item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 13, 2024 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A new video captures a 1968 demo of IBM’s Executive Terminal (118 points | 17 comments)
2. The Age of Average (18 points | 2 comments)
3. A transformer supply crisis bottlenecks energy projects (32 points | 18 comments)
4. Fixing the Loading in Myst IV: Revelation (37 points | 4 comments)

6. Clio: A system for privacy-preserving insights into real-world AI use (18 points | 2 comments)
7. Mathematicians uncover a new way to count prime numbers (38 points | 5 comments)
8. Microsoft Discontinues iMac Rival Surface Studio 2 (39 points | 25 comments)
9. Taming LLMs – A Practical Guide to LLM Pitfalls with Open Source Software (87 points | 13 comments)
10. Microsoft GW-Basic User's Guide and Reference (1989) [pdf] (8 points | 1 comment)
11. Show HN: DataFuel.dev – Turn websites into LLM-ready data (34 points | 21 comments)
12. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (831 points | 133 comments)
13. Fermat's Last Theorem – how it's going (290 points | 134 comments)
14. Misperception of the facial appearance that the opposite-sex desires (74 points | 46 comments)
15. Scrabble star wins Spanish world title despite not speaking Spanish (78 points | 53 comments)
16. Trinity Desktop Environment (TDE) (59 points | 22 comments)
17. A new timeline for Neanderthal interbreeding with modern humans (47 points | 21 comments)
18. Unexpected Keyboard (169 points | 78 comments)
19. Gukesh becomes the youngest chess world champion in history (928 points | 378 comments)
20. Learning Tibetan changed the way I think (2023) (54 points | 32 comments)
21. Canada euthanasia now accounts for nearly one in 20 deaths (388 points | 667 comments)
22. A room temperature Li2O-based lithium-air battery enabled by a solid electrolyte (82 points | 37 comments)
23. Rust's Incremental Compiler Architecture (20 points | 2 comments)
24. Refactoring in C++: Top Techniques and Best Practices (27 points | 9 comments)
25. Converting untrusted PDFs into trusted ones: The Qubes Way (2013) (90 points | 31 comments)
26. Bitbanging 1D Reversible Automata (70 points | 11 comments)
27. Show HN: Lfi – a lazy functional sync, async, and concurrent iteration library (67 points | 16 comments)
28. Show HN: Quantus – LeetCode for Financial Modeling (233 points | 48 comments)
29. The secret life of DNS packets (2019) (47 points | 6 comments)
30. Android XR (296 points | 255 comments)
